name: Input
description: Create custom keybindings and retrieve input information.

static_functions.name: Bind
static_functions.description: Binds a function to an Input defined using `Register` or from the game

static_functions.name: Unbind
static_functions.description_long: Unbinds all Input functions related to the given binding_name and input_event

static_functions.name: Register
static_functions.description: Registers a keybinding to a default key

static_functions.name: GetKeyIcon
static_functions.description: Gets the icon path of a key

static_functions.name: GetMappedKey
static_functions.description: Returns the key bound to a keybinding

static_functions.name: ResetBindings
static_functions.description: Resets all bound functions by this Package

static_functions.name: GetScriptingKeyBindings
static_functions.description: Returns a table with all Scripting KeyBindings
